introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this video is さんか which you will often hear in meetings, events, club activities, and when talking about joining groups. Imagine how much more natural your Japanese will sound when you can say things like I will participate in the meeting tomorrow, She decided to participate in the school festival, Did you participate in the volunteer cleanup in Japanese. Let's get started!
meaning_explanation_english: The word さんか means to take part in or join an event, meeting, or group, to attend activities or become involved.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 出席 : しゅっせき : attendance
加入 : かにゅう : joining
synonym_explanation: The most common synonyms of the さんか are しゅっせき and かにゅう. しゅっせき emphasizes being present or attending an event or meeting, focusing on physical attendance. かにゅう emphasizes joining or becoming a member of a group or organization, often implying a formal entry or subscription.
antonyms: 欠席 : けっせき : absence
不参加 : ふさんか : nonparticipation
antonym_explanation: The most common antonyms of the さんか are けっせき and ふさんか. けっせき means being absent or not attending an event, highlighting physical absence. ふさんか means non participation or choosing not to take part, stressing the decision not to join.

collocations.kanji: しゅうかいにさんかする
collocations.furigana: しゅうかいにさんかする

collocations.kanji: うんどうかいにさんかする
collocations.furigana: うんどうかいにさんかする

example_sentences.kanji: 明日、イベントに参加します。
example_sentences.furigana: 明日(あした)、イベントに参加(さんか)します。

translations.EN: I will participate in the event tomorrow.
translations.VI: Tôi sẽ tham gia sự kiện vào ngày mai.
translations.MY: မနက်ဖြန် အခမ်းအနားမှာ ပါဝင်ပါမယ်။
translations.HI: मैं कल कार्यक्रम में भाग लूंगा।
translations.FA: من فردا در رویداد شرکت می‌کنم.

example_sentences.furigana: 会議(かいぎ)に参加(さんか)します。

translations.VI: Tôi sẽ tham dự cuộc họp.
translations.MY: အစည်းအဝေးကို တက်ပါမယ်။

example_sentences.kanji: 明日、集会に参加します。
example_sentences.furigana: 明日(あした)、集会(しゅうかい)に参加(さんか)します。

translations.EN: I will attend the meeting tomorrow.
translations.VI: Tôi sẽ tham dự cuộc họp ngày mai.
translations.MY: မနက်ဖြန် အစည်းအဝေးမှာ ပါဝင်ပါမယ်။
translations.HI: मैं कल सभा में भाग लूँगा।
translations.FA: من فردا در جلسه شرکت می‌کنم.

example_sentences.kanji: 私は運動会に参加します。
example_sentences.furigana: 私(わたし)は運動会(うんどうかい)に参加(さんか)します。

translations.EN: I will participate in the sports day.
translations.ID: Saya akan ikut acara hari olahraga.
translations.VI: Tôi sẽ tham gia ngày hội thể thao.
translations.FR: Je participerai à la journée sportive.
translations.TL: Sasali ako sa araw ng palakasan.
translations.MY: ကျွန်တော် အားကစားပွဲမှာ ပါဝင်မယ်။
translations.HI: मैं खेलकूद कार्यक्रम में भाग लूँगा।
translations.FA: من در روز ورزش شرکت می‌کنم.

example_sentences.furigana: 参加者(さんかしゃ)は十人(じゅうにん)です。

translations.MY: ပါဝင်သူများ တစ်ဆယ် ဦး ရှိပါတယ်။

example_sentences.furigana: 参加(さんか)費(ひ)は500円(えん)です。

translations.ES: La cuota de participación es de 500 yenes.
translations.FR: Les frais de participation sont de 500 yens.
translations.TL: Ang bayad sa paglahok ay 500 yen.
translations.MY: ပါဝင်ခ 500 ယန်း ဖြစ်ပါတယ်။

participation.MY: ပါဝင်ခြင်း
